name: RedMan
0:
”Alexa, launch Red Man”
”I like it”
”start over”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: red man
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill enables you to listen to audio posts from Paris, France-based Reda Bouzid, who will share his thoughts, ideas, and feelings about his day to day work as an established Antiques dealer and a Paris bon vivant. 

If you like a given post you are listening to, just say, "I like it." You can also say, "repeat," "skip" and if you want to find posts that mention specific words (for instance, "church bells"), just say "find" followed by the word or words ("Alexa, find 'church bells').
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
